name: XpCade 2022 - Prototype 2
description:
In this version, you are in a garage with an arcade machine and a couple of doors.

You can play the arcade machine, and program it with a special language: the Adapter. Then you can go out and have some fun with a survival FPS set in the desert, where you are going to search for amno and water and fight giant spiders.

If you want me to bring ahead this project please leave your feedback.

Controls: 

WASD + mouse OR WASD + arrow keys : Move and look

Mouse button 1 or Q : Fire

E : interact
